data.text: @surreywillis My sister-in-law passed away from liver failure. Was awful watching her decline. The sooner you get diagnosed the better chance of transplant if your in liver failure
@surreywillis If you have liver disease, please go to the ER.
@surreywillis I hope you get care soon
@surreywillis Mike I'm hoping very much you're ok.  🙏
@surreywillis Hope you can get bloodwork soon. So hard to navigate healthcare right now.
@surreywillis Sending positive thoughts your way Mike . 🙏🏻
@NewsReader604 @surreywillis I didn’t know that,  I’m so sorry to hear you are still affected.

@surreywillis @Tim_Ell For sure but you could get a video appointment for the requisition for blood tests and ask for the results to be sent to them. Seems crazy you can't just get a blood test so you know what's going on. Call 811 maybe they can help you get one too?
@DebraJ43 @Tim_Ell idk. my family doctor and specialist know my history
@surreywillis @Tim_Ell Can't you just do a video chat with a Doc and ask for a requisition for a blood test? Am I missing something...
